text: He told me, “This is the curse that is going out to all the world. Anyone who steals will be purged5:3. Or “cut off.” from society, according to one side of the scroll. Anyone who swears lies under oath will be purged from society, according to the other side of the scroll.”5:3. One side of the scroll/other side. This is the commonest understanding of the meaning here, but there are other interpretations.
